text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Aomori, Hirosaki Park — The Hirosaki Castle 
standing within is not only designated as an 
important cultural property, but it is also 
famous for its cherry blossoms!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
The view of the flower boats floating on 
the moat, along with the castle and cherry 
blossoms, creates a charming scenery that 
you won't want to miss♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I just came up with a new catchphrase! 
『Cherry blossoms at the castle, 
hot pot with chanko, and Umamusume at 
the racecourse』!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but the cherry blossoms at the school 
are also beautiful, and rice cooked in a clay 
pot is delicious too… Hmm.
